entries.title: Crypto Media Outlet CoinDesk Taps Bankers for Potential Sale
entries.description: The company has “received numerous inbound indications of interest,” CEO Kevin Worth says.

entries.title: Apple Resurrects the Full-Size HomePod With a $299 Price Tag
entries.description: The speaker has room-sensing technology and sensors that listen for smoke and carbon-monoxide alarms.

entries.title: Twitter Is Auctioning Off Kegerators, Office Supplies From Its Headquarters
entries.description: The company listed more than 600 items, including a neon bird sign that’s currently fetching $27,500.

entries.title: Microsoft to Lay Off 10,000 Employees
entries.description: The company is the latest tech titan to announce an additional round of cuts amid concerns about the health of the global economy.

entries.title: Alexa, That Isn't Elvis! New Music Shuffle Irks Amazon Prime Users
entries.description: Bigger song catalog brings less choice for some; ‘a lot of cussing’

entries.title: Elon Musk Trial Over Tesla Tweets Heads for Opening Statements
entries.description: The shareholder lawsuit stems from 2018 tweets in which the billionaire CEO said, “Am considering taking Tesla private at $420. Funding secured.”

entries.title: Global IT Spending Decreased in 2022
entries.description: Citing economic uncertainties, Gartner lowers its enterprise tech forecast for 2023.

entries.title: Microsoft Plans to Announce Layoffs as Early as Wednesday Morning
entries.description: The software giant would join other tech companies that since the start of the new year have trimmed their ranks.
